text: Kare-ra wa odoroite itta. `Suruto hontōni anata wa, yūsufuna nodesu ka.' Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa yūsufudesu. Kore wa watashi no otōtodesu. Arrā wa tashika ni watashi-tachi ni megumi fukaku ara reru. Hontōni omo o osore, ken'nindearunaraba, arrā wa kesshite zenkō no to e no hōshō o, munashiku nasa renai
